name: Battle Monsters
summary:
THERE'S A RUMBLE IN HELL... AND YOU'RE INVITED. 
 
TWELVE PSYCHOTIC MONSTERS FIGHT FIST-AND-FANG IN THE DARKEST, GORIEST HEAD-TO-HEAD COMBAT EVER! IN BONE-CHILLING INTERACTIVE, MULTI-LEVELED ENVIRONMENTS, THE BEASTS OF THE UNDEAD TRADE CLAWFULLS OF SICKENING SUPERMOVES IN THEIR BID TO RULE THE UNDERWORLD. OVERFLOWING WITH, GUTS, DROLL AND SLIME, BATTLE MONSTERS IS MULTI-HIT, MID-AIR FIGHTING BLOOD LUST... FEELING LUCKY, FREAK?
